ai-tha-ap311:1.4_0: the world’s Elder, and the world does not clever.
ai-tha-ap311:2.2_0: He explained the path to the world
ai-tha-ap311:2.3_0: filling my mind with confidence in him,
ai-tha-ap311:2.4_0: when they are reborn in a good place.
ai-tha-ap311:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap311:3.4_0: and the fruit of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap311:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap311:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vāsava.
ai-tha-ap311:6.1_0: The ninth senior mendicant who is trained in the Buddha’s instructions.
